meta_description: National Civil War Naval Museum located in Columbus, GA.
admission_text:
Annual Membership

Member benefits for all levels include:

· Complimentary admission for member

· Special members only events

· Quarterly digital newsletter

​

Ensign (Individual) $30

· General membership benefits +

· 10% discount in the museum store

​

Master (Dual) $60 

· General membership benefits +

· 2 membership cards

· 10% discount in the museum store

Lieutenant $125

· General membership benefits +

· Free admission for family (2 adults + 4 children)

· 10% discount in the museum store

· North American Reciprocal Museum Association (NARM) membership* 

​

Lt. Commander $250

· General membership benefits +

· Free admission for family (2 adults + 4 children)

· 10% discount in the museum store

· 4 complimentary guest passes

· NARM membership

Commander $500

· General membership benefits +

· Free admission for family (2 adults + 4 children)

· 15% discount in the museum store

· 6 complimentary guest passes

· NARM membership 

Commodore $1,000

· General membership benefits +

· Free admission for family (2 adults + 4 children)

· 15% discount in the museum store

· 10 complimentary guest passes

· 10% discount on Gallery rental

· Personal museum tour

· NARM membership ​​

*Memberships at the Lieutenant level and above now include membership to the North American Reciprocal Museum Program, granting free admission to 1000+ participating historical and cultural institutions.

[NARM member institutions>](https://narmassociation.org/members/)​

###### The Museum

By telling the stories of the navies of the Civil War, we connect people with the past; giving them a better sense of place and time.

[Read More Here >](https://www.portcolumbus.org/about)
